description: Thanks to its coloration, a cloud ray has a +16 racial bonus on Hide checks. *When it tires of drifting through the sky, it settles to the ground for rest. Through a combina- tion of telekinesis and moving its great wing-flaps, it covers itself with dust, dirt, rocks, logs, uprooted bushes, and what- ever else is nearby. While it is thus camouflaged, its Hide modifier rises to +32. The ray may rest on the ground thus covered for a few hours or a few weeks.
